snippet.title: Windows 8 to bring 10-second boot-ups to new PCs
snippet.description: ...Microsoft says it has developed a hybrid shutdown and boot process for Windows 8 that merges the traditional cold boot approach with resume-from-hibernate functionality, reducing startup time by 30% to 70% and resulting in 10-second boot times for new PCs with solid state disks.
